hero.name: Marine Allavoine
hero.description: [Text generated by ChatGPT to replace LoremBlabla]Artist of code lines, I sculpt web experiences as inspiring as they are inclusive. With a passion for aesthetics and expertise in front-end development, I shape an internet where creativity and accessibility harmoniously intersect.

about.aboutContent: As a web developer passionate about accessibility, I strive to combine my strong technical skills with a deep human sensitivity. Drawing from my background in Visual Arts, I pay careful attention to the importance of aesthetics and inclusivity in web design. My current training in front-end development allows me to realize this vision, using my artistic background to creatively think about accessibility solutions. I believe that technology should serve everyone, and I am committed to creating online experiences that are accessible, intuitive, and aesthetically pleasing for all users.
